+ _Test Cases_

  + Setup: _No prerequisites required_

    + Check margins are set to the default value then change margins and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify margins are set to expected default: 1,1,1,1
      + Verify margins on output are 2,.5,1.5,.25 (top, bottom, left, right)
    + Check header and footer height are set to default then change header and footer height and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify header and footer heights are set to expected default: .5,.5
      + Verify header and footer heights on output are .25 (header) and 1 (footer)
    + Check page size is set to default then change page size and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify page size is set to expected default: 8.5,11 
      + Verify page size on output is 9,12 (height, width)
    + Check orientation is set to default then change orientation and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify orientation is set to expected default: landscape
      + Verify orientation on output is portrait
    + Check font size is set to default then change font size and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify font size is set to expected default: 12
      + Verify font size on output is 14
    + Check font is set to default then change font and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify font is set to expected default: Courier New
      + Verify font on output is Comic Sans
    + Check header rows is set to default then change header rows and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify header rows is set to expected default: 1
      + Verify header rows on output are 2
    + Check column header buffers is set to default then change column header buffers and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify column header buffers are set to expected default: 0,0
      + Verify column header buffers on output are 2,1 (top, bottom)
    + Check ignore cell padding is set to default then change ignore cell padding and verify changes are reflected in the output
      + Verify ignore cell padding is set to expected default: FALSE
      + Verify ignore cell padding on output is TRUE
